description.p: The name of a specific remote integration node that you want to connect to.
If authentication security is enabled on the remote integration node, you must specify a user name. The user name must match a valid web administration account for the remote integration node.
If authentication security is enabled on the remote integration node, you must specify a password. The password must be the valid password for the specified user name.

If enabled, the password is encrypted in Eclipse secure storage, which is a local file that is shared by Eclipse based products such as IBM Integration Toolkit. For more information, see Window -> Preferences -> General -> Security -> Secure Storage.
If enabled, the connection to the remote Integration bus uses the Hypertext Transfer Protocol (HTTP) on top of the Secure Sockets Layer.

Change the password that is used to connect to the remote integration node, and is encrypted in Eclipse secure storage. To remove the password from Eclipse secure storage, leave the password field empty, and click OK.
